t: Amazon.com : Traeger Ironwood XL Wood Pellet Smoker Grill, 924 Sq In Cooking Area, WiFIRE Smart Temperature Control, Up to 500 Degrees, Super Smoke Mode, 6 in 1 Outdoor BBQ Electric Smoker and Grill : Patio, Lawn & Garden
s: When I asked about a Service Technician coming out, Traeger became IRRATE. I asked to speak with their manager and they were as bad. Please Note: I was pleasant during the entire call ... I just was requesting immediate service. They do not service under warranty unless you take it to a Service Center. Now I missed Father's Day Cook Out and tomorrow 6/24/23 will miss cooking for my Mom's 80'th Birthday. My son in law will do the cooking on his different Brand ...

t: Amazon.com : Traeger Grills Pro 780 Wood Pellet Smoker Grill, 6-in-1 ...
s: My buddy got a Traeger 570 last year and I was sufficiently impressed that I had been looking for an excuse to get a smoker myself after doing it on my gas grill with indirect heat and smoke tubes. Watched dozens of video reviews of different brands and kept coming back to the Traeger.
